author: Bob Beacham
title: The Best Spider Repellents to Keep Creepy Critters at Bay
text:
Best Overall
Product Specs
- Type: Ready-to-use spray
- Quantity: 16 ounces
- Active ingredients: Peppermint oil, geraniol
Pros
- An effective plant-based product made with U.S.-sourced peppermint
- Long-lasting concentrated formula in easy-to-use spray bottle
- Works as both an indoor and outdoor spider repellent when applied regularly
Cons
- Although safe when dry, it should never be sprayed on or near dogs and cats
Many people like the smell of peppermint, but spiders do not. This plant-based repellent spray from Mighty Mint is made up of 3 percent U.S.-sourced peppermint and 1 percent geraniol, the main component of citronella oil. It can be sprayed on plants, hard surfaces, and most fabrics (though we recommend testing a patch first).
When using it as an indoor spider repellent, users will want to apply it once a week. It will also work outdoors in sheltered areas. Mighty Mint states that its spider repellent is safe when used as directed. Be cautious, though: Like some other insect repellents, peppermint oil can cause respiratory distress in some children and is toxic for many pets, so apply it judiciously.
Get the Mighty Mint spider repellent at
Amazon, Walmart, or Target.

author: Tatiana Krisztina
title: Gayle King criticizes 'sexist' remarks about Blue Origin flight, highlights scientific contributions - The Mirror US
text:
Gayle King has hit back at critics who dismissively referred to her recent Blue Origin flight as a "space ride," labeling the term "sexist."
The esteemed 70-year-old broadcaster was in good company with celebrities like Katy Perry, Jeff Bezos's fianc√©e Lauren Sanchez, ex-NASA rocket scientist Aisha Bowe, civil rights advocate Amanda Nguyen, and film producer Kerianne Flynn for the brief but momentous 11-minute trip. The all-female crew triumphantly completed their journey to the K√°rm√°n line ‚Äì the universally accepted edge of space - and returned from a secluded Texas ranch on Monday morning aboard Jeff Bezos's rocket.
They experienced three minutes of weightlessness before their descent back to Earth. In a post-flight interview, Gayle expressed frustration over the trivializing language used to describe their expedition, stating, "They call it a ride, which I find very irritating because they never say men went for a ride."
Addressing skepticism about the scientific merit of their voyage, Gayle, alongside Aisha Bowe, discussed the broader implications of space exploration on CBS Mornings on Tuesday. "There's so many things that have been developed in space that benefit Earth...from pharmaceuticals to, like, research on agriculture," Aisha highlighted, reports the Mirror.
"And, you know, I paused there because we did research and it was emotional...part of what I accomplished in my flight was I was looking at the future of being able to produce crops that can withstand harsh environments so we can look at food security here on Earth, and simultaneously, we also were able to certify that device so more people could do research on New Shepard," she continued.
Gayle previously criticized those who referred to the flight as a "ride," arguing that no one would ever say to a [male] astronaut, "'What a ride.' [Don't] call it a ride."
She further clarified, "It's called a flight or a journey. A ride implies it's something frivolous or lighthearted. There's nothing frivolous about what we did."
This follows Lauren Sanchez, Jeff Bezos' soon-to-be wife, expressing her hopes in a video post that the mission would inspire others to "dream big." She admitted, "If someone would have told me that I would be able to go to space one day, I would have definitely, well, I don't know, laughed."
"I can't believe it's happening. My dad used to teach people how to fly, and I used to hang around the hanger and I thought dreaming of becoming a pilot was a huge deal, and this is even bigger.
"The incredible women that are going on this flight are extraordinary in all of their fields, but more importantly, they're incredible storytellers," she continued, "So what I'm hoping for is, this flight is not just transformative for them, but also for all of the people that they tell their story to. Hopefully it sparks that imagination to a dream big and reach for the stars."

author: Judy Bass
title: Why Aren't Hawkshaw Hawkins And Cowboy Copas Remembered As Much As Patsy Cline? All Three Died In Deadly Plane Crash - Wide Open Country
text:
When a famous person perishes in an accident or plane crash along with others, it always seems to be the famous person who gets the most ink. That is rather unfair, I believe. Case in point: the 1963 plane crash that took the life of country singer Patsy Cline . The two other passengers who also lost their lives were Hawkshaw Hawkins and Cowboy Copas. (The pilot, Randy Hughes, was killed as well.) They have sadly vanished into the mist of history. Those men were stars when they died. Why did they get marginalized?
Patsy Cline's Death Has Been Extensively Chronicled; Not So With The Other People On The Plane Per The Tennessean , "In the half-century following the plane crash, Cline has been the subject of a feature film, a stage play and several biographies, while the lives of Copas, Hawkins and Hughes have been less studied. The focus on Cline alone has been hurtful to some of those left in tragedy's wake."
The lives and careers of all three mattered. Maybe they did not, from today's viewpoint, attain the same degree of fame as Cline, but they counted too.
Even Charlie Dick, Cline's widower, agreed. Per the outlet, he said, "'When that plane went down, Copas was the biggest star onboard,' Cline's widow[er], Charlie Dick, told Opry announcer, country music historian and WSM air personality Eddie Stubbs five years ago."
Sometime later, Dick added more to that sentiment. "Usually, today, Patsy seems to get top billing. But Patsy was a big fan of Copas and Hawk, and they were stars. Everybody on that plane was important to the music business. And all of them were top dogs."
More About Cowboy Copas, Hawkshaw Hawkins, And Randy Hughes All three men were exceptional. And talented. They each had impressive resumes. Hawkins scored a chart-topping song, " Lonesome 7-7203 ." Hughes, at 34, was already a capable manager for Cline. And Copas was a guitarist and skilled musician.
Hawkins' wife, Jean Shephard, reportedly chafed at the attention Cline received, as opposed to the scant scrutiny that the others' deaths got.
According to The Tennessean , Shepard set the record straight. "A lot of people think during this time that I've hated Patsy Cline. And that's not the story at all. I resented the way it was presented, like she was the only person on that airplane. ...I lost as much as Charlie Dick did. He lost a wife."

author: Maren Angus
title: Dodgers‚Äô Freddie Freeman Out of Lineup For Second Straight Day
text:
Dodgers Team News
Dodgers‚Äô Freddie Freeman Out of Lineup For Second Straight Day
Freddie Freeman will not be in the Los Angeles Dodgers starting lineup for a second consecutive night as he rests a fractured middle finger on his right hand.
Gavin Lux will hit third against the Baltimore Orioles on Wednesday night and Kik√© Hernandez will get another start at first base.
The Dodgers have not placed Freeman on the injured list.
Hern√°ndez is getting the start at first base for just the third time this season, and batting ninth. Teoscar Hern√°ndez moves to fourth after hitting third on Tuesday night.
Freeman, 34, is hitting .284 this season with 17 home runs and 73 RBIs. His .382 on-base percentage leads the Dodgers and ranks second in the National League this season. His .475 slugging percentage gives him an .856 OPS (141 OPS+).
An All-Star in July, Freeman missed eight games immediately after the break while his son, Max,
battled a rare case of Guillain-Barre Syndrome. Since returning, he‚Äôs been slowed by a hairline fracture in his right middle finger.
Through Sunday, Freeman is 3 for his last 23 with seven strikeouts.
Freeman is currently under a 6-year, $162 million contract with the Dodgers that runs through 2027. A five-time All-Star, three-time Silver Slugger Award winner, and the 2020 National League MVP, Freeman has never been on the injured list since joining the Dodgers in 2022.
Last season, Freeman led the National League in doubles (59) while hitting 29 home runs and slugging .567. This year he‚Äôs seen his slugging percentage fall nearly 100 points.
The Dodgers were already missing Freeman‚Äôs power bat with or without him in the lineup, so the time off makes sense. The longer he goes without playing, however, the more a backdated injured list stint seems possible.
Photo Credit: Jayne Kamin-Oncea-USA TODAY Sports

YouTube channel? livestreams, and more!

author: Alejandro Sanchez
title: Israel asume el "fracaso" en el rescate de tres rehenes a los que mat√≥: "Los ataques podr√≠an haberse evitado"
text: El Ej√©rcito israel√≠ ha asumido su "fracaso" en su misi√≥n de rescatar a los tres rehenes que las tropas israel√≠es mataron en Gaza por error el pasado 15 de diciembre, tras publicar este jueves una investigaci√≥n con m√°s detalles del incidente. "Las fuerzas israel√≠es fracasaron en su misi√≥n de rescatar a los rehenes", y "toda la cadena de mando se siente responsable", asegur√≥ el jefe de Estado Mayor, Herzi Halevi, en las conclusiones de las pesquisas hechas por el Ej√©rcito que se han difundido este jueves. Seg√∫n lament√≥ Halevi, "los ataques a los cautivos podr√≠an haberse evitado", ya que "en una situaci√≥n donde no existe una amenaza inmediata y no se identifica un enemigo claro, es necesario un momento de examen antes de disparar". "Esto es necesario para evitar, entre otras cosas, incidentes en los que nuestras fuerzas disparen contra nuestras fuerzas", agreg√≥. Seg√∫n reconoci√≥, en el caso de los tres rehenes muertos, estos "no se mov√≠an amenazadoramente y sosten√≠an una bandera blanca", por lo que habr√≠a sido "correcto confirmar la identificaci√≥n antes de disparar", pero "las condiciones de presi√≥n y el entorno operativo dificultaron que los soldados implementaran estas medidas". Sin embargo, no se espera que el Ej√©rcito israel√≠ tome medidas disciplinarias contra los militares que mataron a los tres cautivos. "No oyeron la orden" De acuerdo con la investigaci√≥n militar, uno de los rehenes, Yotam Haim, recibi√≥ disparos un cuarto de hora despu√©s de que los soldados que operaban en el barrio de Shijayia de la ciudad de Gaza hubieran disparado ya a los dos otros rehenes, Samer Talalka y Alon Shamriz. Seg√∫n las propias pesquisas, Haim huy√≥ tras los disparos contra los dos otros cautivos, y "aproximadamente 15 minutos despu√©s, el comandante del batall√≥n escuch√≥ gritos en hebreo de 'ayuda'". Tras ello, "dio √≥rdenes para suspender el fuego, gritando en hebreo 'venid hacia nosotros'", ante lo que el reh√©n "emergi√≥ de un edificio hacia las fuerzas israel√≠es", pero "dos soldados, que no oyeron la orden" de cesar el fuego "por el ruido de un tanque cercano, le dispararon y mataron". Seg√∫n la investigaci√≥n, antes de que se les matara por error, los rehenes "caminaban sin camisa, y uno de ellos ondeaba una bandera blanca, parado en un punto de visibilidad limitada respecto a la posici√≥n del soldado que dispar√≥".

author: Cory Kinnan
title: Browns: Jeff Driskel, David Bell connect for 2nd touchdown vs. Bengals
text:
The Cleveland Browns strike again against the Cincinnati Bengals. More specifically, quarterback Jeff Driskel and wide receiver David Bell have connected for their second touchdown strike in this game.
Padding his stats in garbage time, Driskell is now up to 168 yards and two touchdowns on 13-of-26 passing. He also has the two interceptions to his name.
Bell is now up to 68 yards and two touchdowns on four catches for the Browns today. This is a career-high for the second-year receiver out of Purdue.
While the Browns trail in this game by a score of 14-31, it remains refreshing to see that even their second and third-stringers are going to play for a full 60 minutes when given the chance.
More importantly, the Browns already have their playoff spot locked down while the Bengals will clean out their lockers in the morning. The Browns will play the Houston Texans in the first round of the playoffs.
. @DB3LL rises up between defenders and muscles his way into the end zone üí™ #CLEvsCIN on CBS & NFL+ pic.twitter.com/JZTFW6uKzZ
‚Äî Cleveland Browns (@Browns) January 7, 2024
More Videos Browns rookie Isaiah McGuire gets his first career sack vs. Bengals Browns get garbage time touchdown as Jeff Driskel finds David Bell deep vs. Bengals D'Anthony Bell not resting, gets second pick as a Brown vs. Bengals Browns join '87 Patriots to start 5 different QBs in a season WATCH: Joe Flacco mic'd up for playoff clinching win over the Jets on Thursday Night

author: Jorge Eduardo Villag√≥mez Ar√©chiga
title: Vive Zona Metropolitana de Monterrey d√≠a ‚Äòinfernal‚Äô - Reporte Indigo
text: Vive Zona Metropolitana de Monterrey d√≠a ‚Äòinfernal‚Äô Calor, apagones, incendios y contaminaci√≥n; a lo regios se les juntaron todas durante la tarde de hoy, una de las m√°s ca√≥ticas en el pasado reciente [Jorge Eduardo Villag√≥mez Ar√©chiga](https://www.reporteindigo.com/author/jorge-villagomez/) Entre una intensa ola de calor, incendios, apagones y mala calidad de aire, los regiomontanos experimentan hoy una de las jornadas m√°s duras en lo que va del a√±o. La temida ‚Äòola de calor‚Äô que se pronostic√≥ desde la semana pasada se dej√≥ sentir con fuerza, elevando el mercurio de los term√≥metros a temperaturas superiores a los 40 grados cent√≠grados, lo que supone un serio riesgo de deshidrataci√≥n y golpes de calor para poblaciones vulnerables. Se espera que la temperatura mantenga una condici√≥n extrema durante hoy y ma√±ana, teniendo mejores pron√≥sticos para el pr√≥ximo s√°bado. 45 infernales grados en la estaci√≥n del metro San Nicol√°s por Av. Universidad üî•üî• 12:40pm [#LaRutaDeDante] [#OndaDeCalor] [#Monterrey] [pic.twitter.com/0H1VuuI3YO] ‚Äî Nelson Valdez (@nelvaldez) [May 9, 2024] A trav√©s de un comunicado, la Secretar√≠a de Educaci√≥n de Nuevo Le√≥n inform√≥ que implementar√° un plan emergente para los planteles de educaci√≥n b√°sica, mismo que consiste en suspender las clases presenciales matutinas a las 11:00 horas en caso de que las temperaturas superen los 40 grados cent√≠grados. Los planteles vespertinos, por su parte, cerrar√°n sus puertas al alumnado en caso de que sigan present√°ndose dichas condiciones. ‚ÄúSe exhorta a los padres de familia con hijas e hijos con alguna precondici√≥n de salud a resguardarlos en sus hogares y no exponerlos ante las condiciones climatol√≥gicas extremas‚Äù, puede leerse en el texto. Apagones e incendios El intenso calor se manifiesta tambi√©n a trav√©s de otros rubros. Desde ayer en la noche se reportan fallos en el suministro de energ√≠a el√©ctrica en diversos municipios de la Zona Metropolitana de Monterrey, tales como Apodaca, Cadereyta, Garc√≠a y San Nicol√°s. La misma situaci√≥n se registr√≥ hoy por la tarde en el sector poniente de Monterrey, especialmente en las zonas de Mitras, Cumbres y Valle Verde. Cuadrillas de la Comisi√≥n Federal de Electricidad trabajan a marchas forzadas para reestablecer el servicio o prevenir pr√≥ximos apagones, situaci√≥n que escal√≥ a nivel nacional debido al sobrecargo en la demanda. Otro incendio en el municipio de Escobedo afectando nuestra calidad del aire, se suma a los reportes ciudadanos de esta tarde a las 15:25 horas en el AMM. Agradecemos sus reportes y permanecemos atentos. 09/05/24 [pic.twitter.com/K5K1aTaS7Y] ‚Äî Observatorio del Aire de Monterrey (@observatoriomty) [May 9, 2024] Para colmo, una seguidilla de incendios registrados a partir del incendio de maleza o fallas el√©ctricas en autom√≥viles ponen en ‚Äòjaque‚Äô a la poblaci√≥n. Algunos de ellos son notorios desde varios puntos de la ciudad; el reportado a espaldas de las ‚ÄòPlazas Outlet‚Äò, sobre la avenida Las Torres, en el municipio de Escobedo, y el de un terreno bald√≠o en el Parque Industrial Las Palmas, en Santa Catarina. Tambi√©n destaca el incendio de un lote de carros en la colonia Cumbres del Sol, en la avenida Abraham Lincoln, al poniente de la ciudad, as√≠ como el de un domicilio particular en la zona de Las Lajas, en San Jer√≥nimo, al poniente de Monterrey. En coordinaci√≥n con Protecci√≥n Civil Garc√≠a, atendemos el incendio de un terreno bald√≠o en. Av. Abraham Lincoln en la colonia Cumbres del Sol. Evite la zona debido a la contaminaci√≥n y presencia de unidades de emergencia Contenido difundido con fines de protecci√≥n civil. [pic.twitter.com/aBHTjz2v4J] ‚Äî Protecci√≥n Civil Monterrey (@pc_mty) [May 9, 2024] Las proliferaci√≥n de polvo provoc√≥ un notorio baj√≥n en la calidad de aire registrada en la Zona Metropolitana de Monterrey. Al corte de las 15:00 horas, y de acuerdo con el √≠ [ndice de Aire y Salud del Gobierno de Nuevo Le√≥n,](http://aire.nl.gob.mx/icars2020/map_calidad_icars.php) once de las catorce estaciones de monitoreo reportan una ‚ÄòMala‚Äô o ‚ÄòMuy Mala‚Äô calidad del aire, siendo las m√°s afectadas las ubicadas en Santa Catarina y Apodaca.

author: @que_diario
title: Hirint consigue revolucionar las pruebas psicom√©tricas con tecnolog√≠a innovadora y √°gil
text: La duraci√≥n media de un proceso de selecci√≥n est√° en torno a los dos o tres meses. Este es el tiempo durante el cual la empresa est√° dedicando recursos a la selecci√≥n de talento, a la vez que tiene un puesto de trabajo sin cubrir. Puesto, cuyas tareas y responsabilidades no est√°n saliendo adelante en la forma en que deber√≠an hacerlo. Para acabar con este problema, [Hirint](https://hirint.io/) lanza su herramienta de evaluaci√≥n de soft skills. Pruebas psicom√©tricas de √∫ltima generaci√≥n que agilizan la evaluaci√≥n de candidatos y garantizan encontrar a los m√°s adecuados para cada puesto. A la vez que mejoran la experiencia de los aspirantes. ¬øC√≥mo ayudan las pruebas psicom√©tricas en la selecci√≥n de talento? A diferencia de otras pruebas utilizadas en el reclutamiento, este tipo de test permite llevar a cabo una evaluaci√≥n objetiva tanto de las habilidades t√©cnicas como de las competencias blandas de los candidatos. De esta forma, es m√°s sencillo tener una versi√≥n hol√≠stica de las capacidades de cada aspirante al puesto. Al aplicar este tipo de pruebas en las fases iniciales de la selecci√≥n, se agiliza el proceso de identificaci√≥n de aquellos candidatos que se ajustan mejor a los requisitos del puesto. De esta manera, se convierten en el complemento id√≥neo para la criba curricular. Los test son pruebas que cuentan con una base cient√≠fica y que dejan totalmente a un lado las impresiones subjetivas. As√≠, el sesgo subjetivo deja de ser protagonista en la toma de decisiones de contrataci√≥n. Se trata, adem√°s, de herramientas que permiten conocer habilidades y cualidades que no son f√°ciles de detectar a trav√©s de una entrevista de trabajo convencional. La influencia de la tecnolog√≠a en las pruebas psicom√©tricas La tecnolog√≠a ha transformado de manera significativa la forma en la que las [pruebas psicom√©tricas](https://hirint.io/utilizacion-de-pruebas-psicometricas-en-la-contratacion-laboral/) se llevan a cabo. El uso de plataformas en l√≠nea para la realizaci√≥n de las pruebas est√° mejorando la experiencia de los candidatos. Que ya no tienen que desplazarse ni estar pendientes de un d√≠a y una hora para hacer su evaluaci√≥n. Por otro lado, la tecnolog√≠a permite crear pruebas mucho m√°s personalizadas y ajustadas seg√∫n las necesidades de cada empresa, dando como resultado evaluaciones m√°s efectivas. En √∫ltima instancia, la aplicaci√≥n de la tecnolog√≠a a este tipo de metodolog√≠as de selecci√≥n permite automatizar el an√°lisis de datos, generando informes que eval√∫an de forma objetiva las capacidades de los aspirantes y que son f√°ciles de entender por parte del personal encargado de la selecci√≥n. La tecnolog√≠a aplicada a los test psicom√©tricos permite agilizar el proceso de selecci√≥n debido a que las pruebas se dise√±an, aplican y eval√∫an de forma autom√°tica por un software. De esta manera, la labor de los reclutadores se centra en tomar decisiones informadas y elegir a los mejores candidatos. Hirint saca el m√°ximo partido a las nuevas tecnolog√≠as La soluci√≥n de Hirint para garantizar una selecci√≥n de personal √°gil y altamente efectiva implica el uso de tecnolog√≠as de √∫ltima generaci√≥n. Las empresas pueden personalizar las pruebas psicom√©tricas en funci√≥n de las habilidades y capacidades que est√©n buscando en los candidatos. Estos realizan las pruebas de forma remota, y los resultados est√°n listos al instante. Con Hirint, crear equipos de trabajo altamente efectivos se vuelve mucho m√°s sencillo y r√°pido.
